CustomField.description: Final e-mail relates to the initial reason for contact to assure all questions/issues have been addressed. Ensures customer is advised of any root causes that were identified and/or resolved.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Final email related to the initial reason for the contact recaps all questions and addresses all issues. Ensures customer is advised of any root causes that were identified and/or resolved as appropriate. POSSIBLE VALUES: 0, 1, 5
CustomField.label: Final e-mail (all issues addressed) *
